title: My Honor level is STUCK
body:
Hey all,
When the honor system got reset, I was placed into honor 2 checkpoint 3. I've been playing constantly since the change, however my honor has not moved at all. I've gotten quite a few 3-4x honors in games recently on a pretty consistent basis, so what is happening?
I'm getting the impression that my honor is bugged, my friends have honor 3 (and have had honor 3 for a good month or two now), while I haven't even moved.

I know the new honor system is suppose to take longer as it's spanning across the entire year, but should it really be taking an excess of months to see any progress? 

Could anyone check why this is happening?
